Hey, My name is Elizabeth Lankford

I am a passionate frontend developer based near North Dallas, TX. I have a passion for creating, learning, and growing my developer skills.

See my projects

Projects All my projects include links to the code and live version. Click the button to learn more about each one.

Quizzical

Quizzical is a simple trivia app that utilizes the Open Trivia Database API to retrieve random trivia questions for the user to answer and scores them. It's built with functional React components.

Learn more

Corgi Meme Generator

The Corgi Meme Picker site allows users to select a mood to return a meme or gif of a corgi that matches the chosen selection.

Learn more

Ruby Creations

An e-commerce site template created for a small business using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.

Learn more

Personal Dashboard

A Chrome Extension that gives you an overview over the current time, how the weather is like and how Ethereum is performing. Interacts with multiple APIs using async JS.

Learn more

Color Pallet Generator

The Color Pallet site uses a color input and a scheme selection to output a color pallet utilizing data from an API.

Learn more

About Me

My professional career began in the IT field when I joined the Marine Corps in 2015. Throughout this period, I mastered key skills including technical troubleshooting and team collaboration. Once my service ended, I continued my career in the IT field while working multiple jobs focusing in customer service, system administration, and device management. After approximately 6 years in the IT field, I had a strong desire to use more of my creativity and troubleshooting skills. I chose to transition to web design and development because it allows me to incorporate my creativity while still utilizing some of the key technical skills I learned throughout my experience in IT. I recently graduated with a bachelorâ€™s in Digital Media Design. Additionally, I have been working through coding boot camps to further my knowledge of the field and master the necessary skills.

Get to know me!

I have a background in IT that started in the Marine Corps. I have a bachelors degree in Digital Media Design. When I'm not coding, I take care of my two dogs and my many houseplants.
